bibl.title: Greek Papyri in the Benaki Museum from the Collections of the Historical Archives.
bibl.note: P. Benaki Mus. 1-7. - Diss. Univ. Athens, 1996. - Four papyri and one waxed tablet. - 1. Receipt for the ὑποκείμενον τῆς λαογραφίας. Bacchias, 25 B.C. or A.D. 19. Excursus: Ὑποκείμενα in papyri. - 2. Lease of a room. Herakleopolites, 2nd half of IVth cent. A.D. - 3. List of soldiers. Hermopolis Magna, 1st half of Vth cent. A.D. - 4-5. Two Christian letters. Faijûm, IVth cent. A.D. - 6-7. An account and writing exercise on a waxed tablet. Arsinoites (?), VIth cent. A.D. - Indexes.
bibl.seg: PAPAPOLYCHRONIOU Eustathios, Greek Papyri in the Benaki Museum from the Collections of the Historical Archives.
Athens, Benaki Museum, 2000, 8°, 158 pp., 7 pll. coul. ISBN 960-8452-78-3.
